price: Shake the trunk of the palm tree towards yourself; fresh ripe dates will drop upon you.
arabic: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
